snippet: Mr. Steiger, a New Yorker who transformed himself into a Western rancher, served five terms in the House as a Republican from Arizona and barged brashly through scandals.
abstract: Sam Steiger, former Arizona congressman who barged brashly through a series of scandals and controversies, dies at age 83.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Steiger, a New Yorker who transformed himself into a Western rancher, served five terms in the House as a Republican from Arizona and barged brashly through scandals.

headline.seo: Sam Steiger, Congressman From Arizona, Dies
headline.main: Sam Steiger, Lawmaker and Lightning Rod, Dies at 83
headline.print_headline: Sam Steiger, 83, Lawmaker and Lightning Rod, Dies
